data.name: Block-exchanging reverse
data.description:
There is an array of 99 elements, you need to reverse it.

Only the exchange of <ins>__neighboring__</ins> blocks is allowed. Max exchanges count is 50.

Format of parameters for one exchange:
```javascript
{
  start: 1,
  length1: 2,
  length2: 3
}
```
where ``start`` - index of start of first block (array.slice), ``length1`` - length of first block, ``length1`` - length of second block.

Exchange of blocks for this parameters:
[0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6] -> [0, 3, 4, 5, 1, 2, 6] (exchange [1, 2] and [3, 4, 5])

Your answer is array of exchanges (see initial solution), in ``exchanges`` variable. Reverse of array run in function ``doReverse`` (see Sample Tests)
